1.0.name: wordpress/upprev
1.0.description:
Display cool, animated flyout or fade box with related content. Just like New York Times.

When a reader scrolls to the bottom of a single post, page or custom post type, a button animates in the page’s bottom right or left corner, allowing the reader to select the previous or random available post or posts in the selected configuration:

  1. Just previous
  2. Previous in category
  3. Previous in tag
  4. Random
  5. Related using YARPP (only post/pages)

Translators

  • Brazilian Portuguese (pt_BR) - Leonardo Antonioli
  • Bulgarian (bg_BG) - Martin Halachev
  • Czech (cs_CZ) - Michal Bláha
  • French (fr_FR) - Eva, Agence web - My Client is Rich
  • German (de_DE) - Mario Wol

3.3.7.name: wordpress/upprev
3.3.7.description:
Display cool, animated flyout or fade box with related content. Just like New York Times.

When a reader scrolls to the bottom of a single post, page or custom post type, a button animates in the page’s bottom right or left corner, allowing the reader to select the previous or random available post or posts in the selected configuration:

  1. Just previous
  2. Previous in category
  3. Previous in tag
  4. Random
  5. Related using YARPP (only post/pages)

Translators

  • Brazilian Portuguese (pt_BR) - Leonardo Antonioli
  • Bulgarian (bg_BG) - Martin Halachev
  • Czech (cs_CZ) - Michal Bláha
  • French (fr_FR) - Eva, Agence web - My Client is Rich
  • German (de_DE) - Mario Wol
